Hey, I'm Julie.






I'm from Texas, I lived on the West Coast for 6 years, and now I live in Brooklyn, NY. I had a close scrape with going to law school after college, but I escaped and learned how to program. I recently completed Hacker School in New York, which was probably the most productive three months of my life. I tweet here, cook with my friends here, and take faux vintage photos here. You can also just email me.
